projects.name: rutgers.quest
projects.tagline: rutgers.quest is a Web and iOS application I made that allows Rutgers University students to watch closed courses and get a push notification when a course they are watching has an open seat available.
projects.description:
- rutgers.quest is a Web and iOS application I made that allows Rutgers University students to watch closed courses and get a push notification when a course they are watching has an open seat available.
- rutgers.quest's backend runs on an Express server hosted on a virtual machine on the cloud, utilizing various Firebase (Google Cloud) services, such as Authentication and Cloud Messaging.
- rutgers.quest's frontend uses JavaScript, HTML, and CSS on the Web and Swift and SwiftUI on iOS.

projects.name: Atrioc Community Projects
W.H.I.T.E.B.O.A.R.D.
projects.description:
- The W.H.I.T.E.B.O.A.R.D. is a Twitch extension that shows the content creator's plans, schedule, and community events.
- The application runs on an embedded website, using an iframe below their channel page for over 300,000 followers to use.
- The application's programming stack involves Node.js, React, TypeScript, Vite, MongoDB, and TailwindCSS.
- Trusted community members are involved with updating the data using a spreadsheet that connects to the application. The application automatically refreshes with any new data.

projects.name: Discord Bot
projects.description:
- The Discord bot helps engage people in the aforementioned Discord server.
- The bot is programmed in JavaScript using Discord.js.

projects.tagline: Various projects I made for the community of the content creator, Atrioc.
projects.description: I have been involved with the community of a YouTube creator with over 500,000 subscribers to moderate and develop projects for a Discord server related to them with over 9,000 members.

projects.name: Passportify
projects.tagline: Passportify is a Web application I made that allows users to generate an image summarizing their activity on Spotify or Last.fm.
projects.description:
- Passportify is a Web application I made that allows users to generate an image summarizing their activity on Spotify or Last.fm.
- Passportify utilizes the Spotify and Last.fm APIs as well as HTML Canvas.

projects.name: Inkstorm
projects.tagline: Inkstorm is a Web application I made that allows users to upload notes to the cloud.
projects.description:
- Inkstorm is a Web application I made that allows users to upload notes to the cloud.
- Inkstorm utilizes many Firebase (Google Cloud) services, such as Cloud Functions and Cloud Firestore.

projects.name: vrtx.dev
projects.description:
- vrtx.dev is my personal portfolio.
- vrtx.dev uses React, TypeScript, Vite, and TailwindCSS.
